body:
Comment 29: 
I think it is entirely safe to say that jz4...'s problem is peculiar
to that particular setup and that it is unlikely to be reproduced
elsewhere.  I am happy to leave this bug as HelpWanted in
case some expert shows up who can explain it.  Especially if
jz4... stops using VirtualBox on that machine, I think we can
move on to other issues.  :-)
